ack.p: We are grateful to the many authors whose open-source R packages were indispensable: John Fox and Sanford Weisberg (package “car”); Gregory R. Warnes (package “gplots”); Hadley Wickham (package “ggplot2”), William Venables and Brian Ripley (package “MASS”); Simon Jackman (package “pscl”); Achim Zeileis and Torsten Hothorn (package “lmtest”); and Christian Kleiber and Achim Zeileis (package “AER”).
